content.detailedDescription:
not " our first sighting " first was 14 yrs ago, second was 10 yrs and now a few days ago.
first was very bright object at 4 am approx 45% above eastern horizon, visible for a few minutes stationary and then gone.

second was at approx 7.30 pm, winter, saw a semi triangular
object ( american ) stealth type shape, with red lights the length of its trailing edge's, flying from south to north at extreme speed , far beyond mach 10, because of speed was unable to gauge hight or size ( no sound )
assuming altitude of at least 20 000 ft ?

friday 5th may 2006 < 9.30 pm as per above description < bright circle, offset in haze, changing colour very rapidly, not like atmospheric effects on normal stars ?
content.summary: Round very bright object, with haze, changing colour very rapidly.

content.detailedDescription: It happened about the time i was walking into my bed room and i noticed a red light through the curtains.I at first though that it was a helicopter but it didn't make any sound . i opened the curtains and watched it as it moved over the field by my house .As it got closer to ground the red lights seemed to get smaller . when it landed it went black . it landed about 1/8 of a mile or so from my house .I wasn't sure what i just saw .So me and my nephew went outside to see if we could see any thing .We noticed a white light moving across the field .It was going off and on .It was shaped like a football but twice as big. when it would go off ,when it came back on it would be in a diffrent place . as a adult i have to say it scared me .So we went back in the house .I didn't watch to see if it left .I have no ideal what it was ,and hope i don't incounter it again .I didn't get much sleep tha night .
content.summary: I seen it from the back ,it looked like a triangle from the back it lite up in red .

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i had just exited our home when we saw a bright orange egg-shaped light that appeared to be aircraft landing lights.  the misshapen glowing mass began descending slowly, meandered downward (unlike a meteor), and seemed to "drip" orange fire like burning plastic.  the object disappeared behind distant trees and we no longer saw it.
content.summary: Glowing object slowly descended in a meandering path.

content.detailedDescription:
i was jogging on the track of the community park. i stopped to rest while laying on my back and looking at the darkening sky not expecting anything eventhough planes pass over regularly, i noticed what i believed to be
a plane at first sight moving horizontally at about a quarter mile away, and one thousand meters high. i knew that i should have been able to hear the engine or jet of a of a plane at that distance and altitude, but there was no sound and there were only two big white lights alternating from what seemed to be the nose and tail unless it was flying side-way. i was so unsure of what it was that it startled me. it passed at the slow speed yet it was much bigger a small plane. as it went over the small park silently and then got to the haze from the many lights of the hospital and businesses a short distance from the park yet along the objects path. it is at that point in the haze i got a glimps of its form from behind. i still don't know adactly what it looks like but it was clear to me that it was not a plane because there were no conventional wings that i could see, and it flew silently. then it was gone as quickly as it came. personally, i was glad to have seen another in the span of five years.
content.summary: Something flying with 2 lights and made no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was just sitting down in the jacuzzi and looked up to see the sky and noticed a colorful flashing light, thought it was a helicopter at first. then i asked my brother to see it and he thought it was a satelite, but it had too many colors and was too low. then my boyfriend got his camera and took a photo. the flashing lights went in a clockwise circular motion.It few steady, the strobe like lights made it look like amoth around a light.When he took the picture the camera was steady resting on the top of his car.As we watched the object on the screen, it moved erratically.Eventually it was too far away to see.I felt curious and perplexed as were the other 2.I felt that it needed to be reported so i called the faa and edwards air force base.Then reported it to the national reporting center in seattle.
content.summary: Three of us watched lights flashing in a circular motion for about 30 mins could not tell what it was, also saw 4 more farther away

content.detailedDescription: i was driving west along the beach on hwy 90 in gulfport at first light one morning.  there was fog along the road and out into the water.  but it was not a heavy fog and the few drivers on the road and myself were not slowing because of it.  i looked out over the water and saw three large balls of fairly dim light aligned vertically just above the horizon out over the water.  these balls of light were about the size of a quarter at arm's length.  they appeared through the fog as sort of a dim yellow.  the fog intermittently obscured parts of the balls but you could make them out pretty well.  other drivers must have seen them.  i have never seen anything like this.  i finally pulled over to the side of the highway to get a more stable view.  these balls of light were large, dim (possibly because of the fog), and stationary and therefore unremarkable but inexplicable.  i got back into my car and began to drive and when i looked again the lights were gone.  i noticed that this month someone in florida had seen the same thing out over the gulf.  their description of it was was almost exactly what i saw.
content.summary: Three large balls of fairly dim light in vertical line just above the horizon

content.detailedDescription:
Looking n / ne from my deck, i noticed a bright white steady light moving towards the se.  there was no strobe, no green light, no red light, and no aircraft noise.

the object was moving at a slower pace than a meteor, and i yelled for my wife and child to come see.  they observed it as it moved toward the se.

the object appeared to make one change in course, but otherwise it moved on in a southeasterly direction.

it was very bright and seemed to just cruise slowly from the n/ne to the southeast until it was out of sight.
content.summary: Bright white slow-moving light, no strobe, no red or green light, no aircraft sound

content.detailedDescription:
Witnesses were in a six-seat airplane, flying from pella, ia to minneapolis, mn.
the three witnesses were seated on the right side of the airplane.  wit a was in copilot seat, wit b in rear, wit c was between them.

two sightings occurred.  

sighting 1:
witnesses were wita and witc. 
occurred at about 7:30 pm.
flying due north, 20 miles south of hampton, ia.
altitude was 3700 ft, level, airspeed 140mph
approaching hampton for refueling.

wit a attention caught by glint of metalic object at 12 o'clock low.  
wit a est that object was 400 ft away, 300 ft below.
object was moving on n to s path, antiparallel with aircraft.  
wit a est that it took less than 3 seconds to move 3 miles as measured against section lines on iowa farm fields

object was round and shiny. there was a red light or lens on the top of it.
size was approximately that of a quarter at arm's length.

wit a turned head to follow object. gone in a second, lost to sight behind head of person sitting behind.  last seen at 5 o'clock low.

wit b also saw object, but i do not yet have his report.


sighting 2 - 8:00 pm - 2 seconds in length:
witnessed by all three wits.
airplane flying from hampton iowa toward minneapolis.
wit b first saw the object (do not yet have his report)
wit a heard wit b 'squeal'.  turned to look back and saw object in rear window of airplane.

all 3 wits observed object in rear window, receding rapidly into distance until lost from sight.

object was primarily visible as a red light against the darker ground.  wit a says that metalic/reflective surface associated with light.  wit b says that only light was visible.
content.summary: 2006 iowa flyby of object past aircraft - two sightings during flight

content.detailedDescription: On january 4, 2006, i glanced at english mountain and noticed a very large oval disc-like silvery-white object.  it was darker around the bottom edges.  immediately it looked strange since you could tell it wasn't a cloud because of its perfect oval disc-like shape.  from the couple of minutes i was able to observe it, there seemed to be some distince geometrical patterns associated with it such as squares running from the far edges reaching up to the top of the object.  something similar to the latitude and longitude lines you'd see on a map.  the object wasn't moving at first and then after two minutes or so, it began reising upward very slow and suddenly shot straight up and out of sight as if it winked out, simply disappearing.  when it shot straight up it punched through a thin layer of cloud cover leaving a hole in the clouds exactly the same shape as the object itself.  smoke trailed the object as it broke through the clouds. i would estimate that the object was 1 to 2 miles away and higher than english mountain which is 3600 feet high.  that would make the object very large in diameter.  i got my camera and took photos within the first 3 to 5 minutes after the hole was made.  the photos are still on my digital camera and have not been erased.
content.summary: I saw a large silvery-white disc-shaped object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: In november of 2005 a friend of mine and i were sitting at an old boat dock and both happened to look up to the soutern part of the night sky and saw a craft with four lights.  it was triangular shaped and had three lights on each tip and one in the center.  it was very dark, but we could see the outline of the triangular craft.  it seemed as if it appeared out of nowhere and it sped off up the moutainside in a spinning maneuver and disappeared.  it was pretty close to the ground in terms of aviation.  it sped off east up a mountainside in a spinning motion on a clear autumn night.  the lights were a strange tinted white/bluish color.  when it got to the top, it sped off extremely fast and then disappeared.
content.summary: A friend and i observed a triangle spinning over a mountainside at night.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out side my house and taking pictures of my gardens which i do each year to see the progress. i was relaxing when i looked up. i always look up.  for birds or whatever. i saw the moon over my roof top. it wasn't as bright as i might have wanted it and all that interesting but i took the shot. i came in a few minutes later after more shots of various emerging flowers. i called my wife and told her that i was about to put the pictures into my computer to look at. i did after we hung up. i lloked at the pic of the moon and saw the white dot. i blew it up and that is what you see. the next day i did it again to proof somethiung to myself and my wife. i took a bunch of photos of the sky and gardens. i saw a bird (hawk) up in the sky and snapped the shot of it. thinking that i might be able to identify it later after blowing it up. i came in and voila! i'd like to say that his the first encounter but it isn't. it was a visual sighting. two of three or more. at night. all around february, spanning three years. anyway i'm very surprized by these pictures. who knows? i certainly don't. but they are a fact! or i just seeing things? the other sightings..I reported them earlier.
content.summary: It's in the pictures that i took. i didn't see them when i took them.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 1 in the morning, still trying to get some sleep. my parents and my brother george were already asleep. the cats were in the bathroom so they couldn't eat mother's plants. i was about to doze off when a blaze of light flashed through my window. shocked, i went to the window and looked up at the tree line. i practically shut down when i saw a large object was circling the house just brushing the tree tops. it was a thick disk shaped craft with a blinding glare. i put on my sun glasses. on top was a large rotating dome with some sort of writings or glyphs engraved into it emitting a blue glow. underneath were 4 smaller domes that were equally spaced. they too were rotating and had glyphs of their own but in purple, red, yellow, and green. focusing even closer showed complex paneling all over. it continued to circle the house as though it was observing the small wooded clearing that was my home. suddenly it stopped and slowly hovered directly over the house. intrigued, i went outside to see what it was doing. on the way out past the bedroom the cats, chuckus buddy and bean bean were going ballistic. meowing, growling, hissing, and blazing about. i went out onto the grass and looked up as the ufo was hovering over the house. as i watched the domes began to rotate faster and faster to the point were the glyphs were practically a line. then the most unbelievable thing happened. a blaze of light engulfed me. i was scared ****less. then came the most unbelivable (and painful) thing. all of the sudden an enourmus shreiking exploded in my head. it forced me to the ground as i even started to bleed out of my ears. then it stoped. i looked up as the ufo began to rise into the sky. as it went up, four orbs each about the size of a car rose out of the forest orbiting in bizzar patterns around the craft. it rose higher and higher and roared off at an incredible speed. battered and realling i draged myself inside and collasped as blood drained out of my ears and pain continued to strike my brain.

although i was fine later on, it was two nights ago on may 7th that the ufo returned and circled the house again. i did not go outside, but i watched it from my window. it flashed several times and left once again with its orbs.
content.summary: Domed disk and 4 large orbs

content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disc w/ lights in southern sky moved up, down, left, right, & restabilizing in 2-3 seconds. 3 more hovering in the western sky.
A black boomerang object that slowly ascended into the sky untill it was out fo sight

content.detailedDescription: My nephew, a friend and i heard the sound of approaching helicopters and could see their navigation lights approaching.  three helicopters in a triangle formation passed overhead in a southwesterly heading.  at first as they began to pass over i noticed that the trailing helicopter was quite some distance from the front two.  then, as they began to pass over i could see that the void between the leading helicopters was not empty at all; there was a black briangle shaped craft without any lights flying between the leading and trailing helicopters.  we were only able to see the craft because it was darker than the slight overcast we had that night.  i am absolutely convinced that the helicopters were "escorting" this craft for some unknown reason.
content.summary: Witnesses saw triangle accompanied by helicopters

content.detailedDescription: Darlene was intrigued by the moon. so i went outside to look at it, and noticed it was a clear night with all of the stars brightly shining. i went back in the house and asked my husband to come out and look at the stars. he was standing in our driveway looking up at the sky and we were discussing which star was the brightest. he then said to me "look at that one there,that one is really bright." then he said " oh sh** it's moving." so i then went from the porch and went in the driveway, and noticed the object moving as well. i was just shocked!! then as it moved slowly across the night sky toward canada, we had noticed a green tint to the object. we were asking each other what the heck it was and was questioning whether or not it was a plane? it had no sound to it.. so we knew it was'nt! plus the speed of it was very slow!! then he had told me to go inside and see what time it was. as i stepped on the porch, he yelled out "oh sh**, oh sh**,look,look." i turned back around, and that's when we both witnessed three small objects being shot out from the larger object towards the left side of it. the smaller objects had a white glow to them. we were both pretty much shooken up to see this happen. as we were watching the three small objects move further away, the larger object disappeared, then the three objects vanished as well. we tried to see where they went, but no such luck!! ali had went in and called the st.Clair county international airport to see if there were any known flights in the area, and told them what we had seen. they said there was not any flights, and to keep watch of the sky. after about 15 minutes of this episode, there was a jet circling the area. we did keep watch for about an hour, and right before i went back in the house, i had noticed yet another small object in circular form, i called my husband back outside to see it. we both watched this object veer in zig zag pattern for about 3 mins, then it vanished out of sight.
content.summary: Circle like object was stationary, then it began moving toward the south toward a casino spotlight, shot off three unknown objects, then both vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was stargazing from the pool area of the doubletree hotel on the 27th of february 2006, when i witnessed three fireballs flying slowly through the clear night sky at 8:30 p.M.  they kept an equal distance from each other until the moment before they disappeared when one of the fire balls on the outside of the formation made a quick and unnatural turn towards the other two.  it was at that very moment when the three disappeared.  i tried to point them out to my friend but he was not able to see them.
content.summary: Witness saw three fireballs while star-gazing at night.

content.detailedDescription:
(1)my wife was sitting on the porch of our condo relaxing on a mild, half-moon clear night.
(2)our condo faces the gulf of mexico with an unrestricted view of the gulf, and she noticed three, marble size yellow lights just above the horizion.
(3)she knew they were not lights from a water craft, an airplane or ballons. the moon was illuminating the surface and nothing solid could be seen. my wife is a nurse, and was a captain in the united states air force for 8 years specializing in aerospace medicine. she owns her own company that investigate medical fraud.  
(4)the three yellow lights were aligned in a east to west angle upwards, with the bottom light about 5 degrees above the horizion with even spacing between each light (about 1 degree seperation). the lights were stationary for about 2 minutes then suddenly were not there anymore. the lights did not fly away, they just were not there anymore. (i was in the underground parking at the time of the sighting washing our golf clubs).
(5)my wife watched the lights for about 2 minutes until they vanished suddenly. being a trained professional nurse and former military officer, she remained calm during this time frame. she informed me of what she had witnessed and i write down the details. i was in the underground parking for about 15 minutes. inside the condo were two of my digital cameras and a digital dvd camera but she did not know how to operate these devices.
(6)the lights just suddenly vanished...In other words...They just were not there anymore.
content.summary: Three yellow balls of lights over the gulf of mexico. all the same size.

content.detailedDescription: I was letting the dog outside and opened the front door which faces south.  i opened the door and before i could open the screen door i noticed two large cigar shaped objects over the manzano mountains.  the objects were blinking rapidly and moving in circular motions.  the color was indistinguishable.  the main color was white but i noticed all the colors of the rainbow.  when i first saw the objects, i wanted to go outside to get a better look, but i was 4 months pregnant with my son and became very afraid.  i wanted to yell for my husband, but i was frozen in place.  i could not speak or move, i just stood there and watched the objects, trying to take in the fact that i was seeing something that i could not explain.  as i watched the objects i tried to understand how large they really were because they appeared large from the distance i was standing.  finally, i snapped to attention and yelled for my husband, when i turned back at the door, the objects were gone.  afterward, i was terrified of thinking that we are being watched.  it was at least a year before i talked about it with anyone.  i called sandia labs and reported the incident to someone who takes ufo reports and he said it is not unusual for people to delay making a report.  i truly believe that what i saw that night was a ufo.
content.summary: 2 objects over manzano mountains from 3am to 3:05am blinking rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at home at 11:30pm when through the sliding glass window i spotted an aircraft flying not too distant across my field of view to the south, toward the west, at a normal aircraft cruising speed.

oddities that make this more of a "ufo" than a normal aircraft sighting:

1) two red lights were visible, no green light, even after the aircraft moved further west so i could see its rear aspect

2) no noise, so not a helicopter.

3) red navigation lights were a bit brighter than normal

4) aircraft also had one or two bright white lights on

aircraft moved behind some trees and i lost sight/interest.

prolly a normal aircraft, but it was a bit odd for one.
content.summary: Spotted somes sort of aircraft with bright red and white ligthts flying at night

content.detailedDescription: Walking along costal path.  the sounds were coming from my right hand side of me at first then went over my head and then stoped somewhere in front.  did not sound like anything i've heard before.  funny...???. this happened two times...Funny...??????.
content.summary: Funny sounds coming from above, to side of me.

content.detailedDescription:
having lunch at sandon point at north wollongong,my partner and i were watching an unusually low flying,large plane (dc-9 or dc-10)flying over the ocean and banking in a southern direction.
wondering and discussing with my partner what the plane was doing.
when the plane had finished banking south i noticed a round black object apear at a 45% angle and about a kilometre behind the plane.It was smaller than the plane. it approached the plane very rapidly and then slowed to the planes speed directly behind it within a second or two.
the speed of the object was what got my attention and i asked my partner if he could see it also.
we watched the object dart behind the plane a few times and then travel above the plane, it also stayed directly behind it for a while as though it was 'tail-gaiting' it. 
just before the object dissapeared it moved in front and above the plane. it stayed with the plane for what seemed like 4-5minutes and then just vanished. 
i initially thought there may be a problem with the plane and a fighter jet may be escorting it,however eliminated this possibility as the object was too small for a jet, round and we heard no sound.( we would have heard a fighter jet!)
we immediately thought we had seen something very unusual and un-identifiable and remembered the reports of recent and increased strange sightings in our area.
content.summary: A black circular object.

content.detailedDescription: I was filming my parents' plane taking off @ john wayne airport... noneventful until i later viewed the footage at my house and saw what looked like little black orbs appearing and dancing around disappearing once again only to reappear.  footage contains two distinct frames where an otherworldly craft (flying at least mach 10) crossed the camera's viewfinder. 1st frame shows a thin profile of a metallic object & the 2nd frame clearly captures the object perfoming a mind boggling bank maneuver.
content.summary: Didn't see it til i got  home and viewed footage 2 home... i surmise it happened too fast for he naked eye to see.

content.detailedDescription: I had just got done with the last delivery and was going to turn in the keys. i looked up and saw somthing like a white balloon, like a small white spot. so i went back in the truck and took out my binoculars and to my surprise it was not a balloon. and it was not been taken with the wind like the clouds,it was very still and had some glowing. i looked for about 3-5 minutes and when i came back out(15mins)later it was gone.
content.summary: Round,white,almost glowing

content.detailedDescription: Once again, my wife and i drove down 347, south into the town of maricopa, looking for the strange lights we've spotted there before.  after about a half hour, we had turned back around and were heading home when i noticed two amber orbs, not far off the horizon, about even with the mountaintops, barely visible in the night sky.  we turned off of the 347 onto a residential street just north of town and started taking pictures and video of the orbs, off to the west-south-west of us.  they were far off this time, but still big and bright, hovering and immobile for the 3 & 1/2 minutes that they were visible to us, apparently out over the far-off range of mountains.  one and then the other then quickly dimmed and disappeared.
content.summary: 2 amber orbs off rt. 347 near maricopa hovered then dissappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were up north in jackson, ca. he had a residential contract job. after his work day was complete,(9:30-10:45 (?) p.M.) he and i hung out in the backyard where a new rock/grotto fountain was added to 'their' property. it was night. i said to my husband how very close the stars were--we can actually touch them. and then the center perfectly round 'orb', that was just above us, zoomed (at a 'normal speed (?)', it zoomed, but allowed our eyes to follow it -- its size changed, its color changed to red, a soft red. the thing is it zoomed to us and zoomed up in the sky, and did the same thing three times. then it was up in the very dark and clear sky, red, changing, like a pulse, and then the right side opened (?) and about five white orbs came out and darted into different directions. there was a low hum, and then quiet and then the red pulsing (game playing) thing in the sky just disappeared. 

our reaction? it's different to watch footage on the history channel or national geographic--but when you see something for yourself, it's not fake anymore. we weren't scared that evening. well, we were so in awe, we just didnt'have time to be scared. we just couldn't believe that what we saw. i didn't think it heard anything i said. the next day, when i woke up, i didn't want to talk but my husband had woken before me and told his "spousal employers" what he and i saw. i didn't want to talk. his employers (where we spent the whole weekend) called their neighbors (in an area where homes are built on the highest tops of mountains). the neighbors said they didn't see anything that night, but they had seen the same thing weeks before.

two days later my mother called me and i told her what i saw. i told my mother i was a loon because i talked to 'it'. my mother asked me what made me think that it didn't hear me? what i said to it is when the low humming sound stopped. and then it disappeared.

the whole next day and since, although i'm not scared, i questioned myself...

...I (this is very difficult for me to describe)

my god. it was right there. i asked 'it' not to hurt me. i explained to 'it' that i could not help them. i repeated over and over again that i could not help them.

it's  not a game anymore, to me. i wonder? are we really ready?

with much respect and awe, 
sincerely,
jeannie neumann
content.summary: At first, sphere shaped, white. directly above us. zoomed away (normal speed) then turned red. came to us. left us. came to us. left us. then, it zoomed far above us and away, and then played with us. it opened up on the right side (my right side) and orb

content.detailedDescription: Witness awoke late in the night and saw a light shining through his bedroom window.  he looked outside and saw a golden shimmering oval glowing object hovering over a hill several hundred yards away.  it was illuminating trees, grass, and houses outside his window.  he watched for several minutes and the object remained unchanged.  he remembers not being surprised or alarmed at the time but just went back to bed.  it was only twenty minutes later, in bed, that he realized anything unusual had occurred.  he went to the window again, but the oval had left.
content.summary: Witness briefly saw oval light outside his window

content.detailedDescription: I was at home (9th floor of a 9-storey building)talking to my wife and then went to another room and where the lights were off and all of a sudden in the window i saw a dazzling ball moving from the north-west leaving an unusual trace behind. immediately i cried to my wife to look out the window. she also noticed the object. obviously it was not an aircraft. the object was too big and of an unusual shape. to my mind its was a bullet-like something, dazzling and leaving a trace of a parabolic form. i should say that it was just 15 minutes before the midnight and therefore almost dark outside, and the object itself was like a fireball spreading the light strictly within the parabolic trace. so, it was like a huge kite. we were watching the object for about a minute and then, due to the limited field of view from the window we'd lost it. i called to a friend of mine and imparted the news to him. unfortunately i didn't have a chance to shoot the event.
content.summary: Fireball-bullet ufo just before the nightfall

content.detailedDescription: Test of the cms system.
content.summary: This is a test report - not a real event - please delete within 7 days.

content.detailedDescription: Witness took a videotape of three lights in a triangular cluster that hovered in the distance and then approached him and passed over him on highway 394 (bristol speedway.  it made no sound at all.  the object then "...Quickly and unnaturally sped off over the horizon."
content.summary: Three bright lights hovered in the distance, then approached the witness.
